page.title: 05SCHOOL AND VILLAGE YEAR 1
page.content: Our school is quite small.It has two classrooms,one big,one small,with a screen between the two.The toilets are outside.The kitchen is built into the wall of the school.At Halloween the children dress up as ghosts or witches.There is a big celebration for Guy Fawkes night.The children make all the gifts to be sold at the Christmas Bazaar.The Easter {Vintage Rally}is the biggest event in the village year. The third and fourth year children take part in an {Adventure Week}each year.The Juniors are involved in an { annual{Music Day}with 10 other schools.This year,though,the schools performed a musical about Amazon Indians.We have two {Sports Days,}one our own and one with 5 other schools. These six schools are in a "cluster group" and often work together.
